feed.title: Cleanuperr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.6.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add option to set a tag instead of changing the category for unlinked downloads by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/133

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.6.4...v1.6.5

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.6.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix logs when using qBit tag instead of category by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/134

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.6.5...v1.6.6

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.6.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add option to set failed import strikes per arr by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/135

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.6.6...v1.6.7

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.6.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update docs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/138
  • Add rate limiting for download removal by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/141

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.6.7...v1.6.8

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: Cleanuparr v2.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update blacklist by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/155
  • Cleanuparr v2 by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/166

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v1.6.8...v2.0.0
